title: Define Design Tokens
description: Create design tokens for consistent styling across the application including colors, typography, spacing, and breakpoints

user_stories: As a designer, I want consistent design tokens so that all UI elements look cohesive
As a developer, I need reusable design tokens so that I can build UIs faster
business_rules: Design tokens must be defined for colors, typography, spacing, and breakpoints
Tokens must be consistent with the brand guidelines
Tokens must be easily maintainable and extensible
edge_cases: Managing responsive breakpoints for various devices
Ensuring token consistency across different components

acceptance_criteria: Design tokens are defined for colors, typography, spacing, and breakpoints
Tokens are consistent with brand guidelines
Tokens can be easily imported and used in components

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow design system best practices for token organization. Ensure tokens are well-documented and easily maintainable.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure no sensitive information is exposed through design tokens
